Reviews.Title: I hated to return it, but..........
Reviews.Author: Rl Shuey
Reviews.Content: I got it at a very good price and it worked great for a few days, but then the video signal started dropping out. I found that I could get the video back by tapping on the camera's case, so back it went. It appears to be just a sample defect, so I gave it a neutral rating just to be fair.

ProductInfo.Features:
1/4" Sony CCD High Video Quality 480 TV Lines Zoom Day/Night Box Security Camera
Video Output:1.0Vp-p, 75 ohms BNC
22X Lens lets you focus and control your security environment
Easy to install and mount brackets
ProductInfo.Name: Vonnic C601S 1/4-Inch Sony CCD 480 TV Lines 22x Zoom Day/Night Box Security Camera
